issue.subject: Add a submenu in backend
issue.description:
I have been using easySDI v4 for some weeks now, and I really miss a submenu in backend (like many other joomla components have).
EasySDI ofen require to switch from a component to another (like MAP and SERVICE) and I think that a 1 level submenu would be time saving for administrators.

!easysdi_backend_menu.PNG!

details.name: description

journals.notes:
TC has validated the proposal for the top submenu.
TC has proposed to add also submenu in the left easySDI menu.
Those two enhacements can be split into 2 separates issues.
Second issue for "TC has proposed to add also submenu in the left easySDI menu." created here: #1058
